owner_tag.description: Owner tag to be applied to resources.

resource_location.description: Azure region to be used for deployment.

environment_tag.description: Environment tag to be used in resource naming convention. Keep to 3 letters to prevent names becoming too long.

domain.description: Azure Active Directory Domain to be used for authentication

subscription_id.description: Id of the subscription into which the analytics landing zone will be deployed

prefix.description: Prefix to be applied to all resource names. Keep to 3 letters to prevent names becoming too long.

resource_group_name.description: Name of the resource group into which the analytics landing zone will be deployed

deployment_principal_layers1and3.description: Object Id of the AAD account that will manage layer's 1 & 3. Note leave this blank if you are going to also include this principal in the resource owner's collection.

synapse_administrators.description: Object with a property for each user that is to be a Synapse Administrator. The property name is descriptive only and should be unique. The property value is the object_id of the user. Leave as empty object when not is use. NOTE - do not include the Synpase Workspace creator in this list as it will be added automatically.

azure_sql_aad_administrators.description: Object with a property for each user that is to be a Azure SQL Administrator. This should be a user or AAD Group. The property name should be the username of the user in AAD and should be unique. The property value is the object_id of the user. You MUST provide the sql_aad_admin property which will determine the AAD Admin setting for the Azure SQL Server.

synapse_publishers.description: Object with a property for each user that is to be a Synapse Publisher. The property name is descriptive only and should be unique. The property value is the object_id of the user. Leave as empty object when not is use.

synapse_contributors.description: Object with a property for each user that is to be a Synapse Contributor. The property name is descriptive only and should be unique. The property value is the object_id of the user. Leave as empty object when not is use.

WEB_APP_ADMIN_USER.description: Object_Id of the user that you would like to have direct, explicit admin access to framework web front end.Set to '#####' if not in use. This setting over-rides the WEB_APP_ADMIN_SECURITY_GROUP. Use in scenarios where use of a security group is not possible.

WEB_APP_ADMIN_SECURITY_GROUP.description: Name of the security group whos memebers will be given admin access to framework web front end.Set to '#####' if not in use.

ARM_SYNAPSE_WORKSPACE_NAME.description: Post Layer 1 Resource name. Deployment of Terraform Layer One will give you these values. They are required to allow subsequent agent deployments to open firewall rules to allow deployment updates.

ARM_KEYVAULT_NAME.description: Post Layer 1 Resource name. Deployment of Terraform Layer One will give you these values. They are required to allow subsequent agent deployments to open firewall rules to allow deployment updates..

ARM_DATALAKE_NAME.description: Post Layer 1 Resource name. Deployment of Terraform Layer One will give you these values. They are required to allow subsequent agent deployments to open firewall rules to allow deployment updates..

ARM_PAL_PARTNER_ID.description: ID of Implementation Partner for PAL purposes. Set to 0 if not in use

GIT_REPOSITORY_NAME.description: Git Repository name used for for publishing ADF and Synapse artefacts.  Only used if synapse_git_toggle_integration or adf_git_toggle_integration is true in the hcl file. Set to '#####' if not using Git integration for Synapse and ADF.

GIT_SYNAPSE_REPOSITORY_BRANCH_NAME.description: Git Branch Name associated with the branch that will be used to publish Synapse artefacts. Only used if synapse_git_toggle_integration is true in the hcl file. Set to '#####' if not using Git integration for Synapse and ADF.

GIT_USER_NAME.description: Usernames of git user used for publishing artefacts.  Only used if synapse_git_toggle_integration or adf_git_toggle_integration is true in the hcl file.  Set to '#####' if not using Git integration for Synapse and ADF.

GIT_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: Email address of git user used for publishing artefacts.  Only used if synapse_git_toggle_integration or adf_git_toggle_integration is true in the hcl file. Set to '#####' if not using Git integration for Synapse and ADF.

GIT_ADF_REPOSITORY_NAME.description: Git Repository name used for for publishing ADF and Synapse artefacts.  Only used if synapse_git_toggle_integration or adf_git_toggle_integration is true in the hcl file.Set to '#####' if not using Git integration for Synapse and ADF.

GIT_ADF_REPOSITORY_BRANCH_NAME.description: Git Branch Name associated with the branch that will be used to publish Synapse artefacts. Only used if synapse_git_toggle_integration is true in the hcl file. Set to '#####' if not using Git integration for Synapse and ADF.

GIT_ADF_USER_NAME.description: Usernames of git user used for publishing artefacts.  Only used if synapse_git_toggle_integration or adf_git_toggle_integration is true in the hcl file.  Set to '#####' if not using Git integration for Synapse and ADF.

GIT_ADF_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: Email address of git user used for publishing artefacts.  Only used if synapse_git_toggle_integration or adf_git_toggle_integration is true in the hcl file. Set to '#####' if not using Git integration for Synapse and ADF.
